title: Help tipography Batman
content:
Hello, I would like knowing that type of typography has the cartel of batman The dark night rise, I put the link of the image so that you could see it, thank you very much, and if know you the one who created the cartel would be very grateful!

[http://media.ign.com/games/image/object/961/961205/dark-knight-rises\_Pos...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418200447/http:/media.ign.com/games/image/object/961/961205/dark-knight-rises_Poster-2012ver.jpg "http://media.ign.com/games/image/object/961/961205/dark-knight-rises\_Poster-2012ver.jpg")
author: soraman9

comments.content: It looks like **[ITC Franklin Gothic (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418200447/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=ITC%20Franklin%20Gothic%20Std%20-%20Demi%20Bold&fid=beae8b5b140c7fa7c6dfe7ab4969be62&fsize=60&text=A%20FIRE%20WILL%20RISE%20THE%20DARK%20NIGHT%20RISES%20JULY%2020%20&wrap=2)** or Demi Bold
